title: Erehamonika remixed by kors k - Der Wald [Koa%wer]
subtitle: Another experimental approach

heroImage.caption: Streams but double the notes every position

videos.comment: Woey's live stream clip uploaded by cpol, he was using mods that give bonus points but also made the map more difficult.

sections.title: Overview
content: This particular difficulty was made by me. The concept here was to overlapping notes without osu auto stack. The pattern looks very unique though there's a buggy slider that should be fixed.

images.caption: 2 notes stream but a bit further
